00042 typedef enum
00043 {
00044     NEITHER = 0,
00045     EMAIL_ONLY,
00046     SMS_ONLY,
00047     EMAIL_AND_SMS
00048 } EmailOrSms;
00049 #define EMAIL 1
00050 #define SMS 2
00051 
00052 #define OUTER_STROKE_COLOR    [UIColor colorWithRed:0.8 green:0.8 blue:0.8 alpha:1.0]
00053 #define INNER_STROKE_COLOR    JANRAIN_BLUE
00054 #define OUTER_FILL_COLOR      [UIColor colorWithRed:0.8 green:0.8 blue:0.8 alpha:1.0]
00055 #define INNER_FILL_COLOR      [UIColor clearColor]
00056 #define OUTER_STROKE_WIDTH    0.1
00057 #define INNER_STROKE_WIDTH    0.5
00058 #define OUTER_CORNER_RADIUS   10.0
00059 #define INNER_CORNER_RADIUS   9.0
00060 #define INNER_RECT_INSET      6
00061 
00062 @interface RoundedRectView : UIView {
00063     UIColor     *outerStrokeColor;
00064     UIColor     *innerStrokeColor;
00065     UIColor     *outerFillColor;
00066     UIColor     *innerFillColor;
00067     CGFloat     outerStrokeWidth;
00068     CGFloat     innerStrokeWidth;
00069     CGFloat     outerCornerRadius;
00070     CGFloat     innerCornerRadius;
00071     BOOL        drawInnerRect;
00072 }
00073 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *outerStrokeColor;
00074 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *innerStrokeColor;
00075 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *outerFillColor;
00076 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *innerFillColor;
00077 @property CGFloat outerStrokeWidth;
00078 @property CGFloat innerStrokeWidth;
00079 @property CGFloat outerCornerRadius;
00080 @property CGFloat innerCornerRadius;
00081 @property BOOL    drawInnerRect;
00082 @end
